ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Haste
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh the man question is easy to answer.  Hybrid casting is such a tiny fraction of their overall balance that adjusting upwards has an insignificant effect on
ygData.messageBody:
Oh the man question is easy to answer. Hybrid casting is such a tiny
fraction of their overall balance that adjusting upwards has an
insignificant effect on their overall power level. Basically they are
admitting that hybrid spells are pretty much just fluff.

Kit

Its typical Verant-speak. They answer questions like a presidential
candidate, don't accept blame, make vague promises, and try not to offend
anyone.

How could mobs possibly be balanced both before and after a significant
change?

Its like when they gave hybrids all that extra mana. How possibly could
hybrids been balanced on both sides of a significant upgrade?

It never ceases to amaze me that a company that A) makes this much money, B)
is very dependent on good relations with its customers has never bothered to
hire a competent PR person.



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
